channel.title: labor negotiations on FinanClub
channel.description: Recent content in labor negotiations on FinanClub

item.title: STLA
item.description: score:-15 Chances: Stellantis collaborates with AGI to electrify US dealerships. Launch of SPOTiCAR in the US by Stellantis. Positive developments in EV initiatives and partnerships. Stellantis invests over $100 million in California lithium project. Jeep brand’s strong performance and enhanced packages for enthusiasts.

item.title: GM
item.description: score:-24 Chances: Positive potential for rebound after recent earnings report decline. Collaboration with battery materials startup for EV battery technology. Partnership with Hyundai Motor to scale up Indian operations. Investment in EV battery startup to shift future focus to cheaper materials. Interest and investment in EV market amid potential value increase.
